entry.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

entry.title: Apheiro/conditional-parent: A flexible, lightweight React component that dynamically wraps its children in any HTML tag or custom component, seamlessly inheriting their props. It also includes an optional feature to disable the wrapper and render only the children when needed.
